txt.en: 'Gerngath is an ancient ruin built by Gondor long before my people came to this land. We used it as a place to store the tales and history of our people. The tomes within have no value in coin but are priceless in the hearts of the Rohirrim. We had tried to keep the library in good repair, but as the forces of the Enemy grew we were forced to abandon it. It has since been occupied by foul Easterlings, seeking anything they can find in order to gain any advantage over us.'
What can you tell me about Gerngath?
